List.Name: Angove Family Winemakers Red Belly Black Chardonnay 2006
Quintessential Case Wine Collection
List.Description:
This collection of wine showcases the quintessential varietals from the most famous wine regions, chosen to best represent the area from which they come.

Wine Set Includes:
  • France: Chateau Maucaillou Le Bordeaux
    It displays aromas of red and black fruits and delicate wood. The palate is both balanced and powerful with fine tannins and a lengthy finish.
  • Italy: Frescobaldi Remole Toscana Rosso
    This Sangiovese has rich notes of blackberry and cherry and fragrant hints of spice and black pepper.
  • Argentina: Bodegas Nieto Senetiner Malbec
    Aromas of red berry fruit and plums dominate the nose; the vanilla scents from the oak barrel add elegance.
  • California: LangeTwins Zinfandel
    This fabulous Zinfandel delivers loads of fresh vibrant blackberries and notes of spice, all balanced by a touch of vanilla oak and soft tannins.
  • Australia: Peter Lehmann Clancy's
    This blend of Shiraz, Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot blend balances the three varietals to give Clancy's great complexity, richness of fruit flavor and a harmonious balance of soft tannin finish.
  • Spain: Marques de Caceres Crianza
    This wine exhibits notes of red berries on the nose. enriched by a depth of vanilla and sweet spice. On the palate, it’s clean and lively with ripe tannins that blend with balanced structure.

  • Austria: Domäne Wachau Federspiel Terrassen Grüner Veltliner
    A typical Grüner Veltliner, this wine is medium bodied with a crisp acidity, very balanced and spicy in the finish. Subtle and racy, with enticing aromas of white pepper, gooseberry and hints of ripe apple.
  • California: Angeline Reserve Chardonnay
    This Chardonnay from California's Central Coast features ripe, juicy pear and apple, along with buttered toast and white flowers.
  • South Africa: Ken Forrester Petit Chenin Blanc
    The Ken Forrester Petit Chenin displays clean, mouthwatering flavors of crisp green apple, quince and pear, with notes of honeysuckle and ripe melon.
  • New Zealand: Giesen Sauvignon Blanc
    The fruit and aroma spectrum shows a greater depth of tropical notes with elderflower, kaffir lime leaf, pink grapefruit and dried herb.
  • Italy: Luna Nuda Pinot Grigio
    The Italian term for "Pinot Gris," this Pinot Grigio exhibits enticing fruit aromas on the nose. The most striking of which are pears and apples.
  • Spain: Condes de Albarei Albariño
    This Albariño from Ramon Bilbao is an exceptional, bright and aromatic wine with sumptuous flavors of tropical fruit, citrus and melons, with a mineral finish.
  • Printed inserts that describes the featured wines

Due to the popularity of this gift, wines or vintages sometimes sell out. Should this happen, we will always substitute with the current vintage and wines with equal or greater value.

List.Name: Galaxy Gift Tower
List.Description:
Metallic star boxes shine bright with the tastiest chocolates on earth. Show them you think they're stellar! Our sublime selection includes star-shaped chocolates, chocolate-covered sandwich cookies, and white and milk chocolate-covered pretzels.

Gift Tower Includes:
  • Chocolate-Covered Sandwich Cookies
  • Milk Chocolate Pretzels
  • White Chocolate Pretzels
  • Chocolate Stars

Please note that due to the popularity of this product, in some cases we may need to substitute items of equal or greater quality.

List.Name: Mer Soleil Silver Unoaked Chardonnay (Ceramic Bottle) 2012
Laurent-Perrier Brut with 2 Flutes
List.Description:
Laurent-Perrier Brut is the standard-bearer for the house style of Laurent-Perrier. Crisp, fresh and elegant, Brut L-P reflects the fundamental essence of our Champagnes.

The color is a pale golden hue, with fine and persistent bubbles. The nose is fresh and delicate, showing good complexity with hints of citrus and white fruit. Brut L-P's light style has led the way to making Champagne the ideal aperitif drink. Its perfect balance, crispness of flavors and finesse also make it the ideal companion for fish, poultry and white meat.

List.Name: B Side Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2011
Fifty Shades of Grey Red Satin 2009
Belle Glos Las Alturas Vineyard Pinot Noir 2013
Il Molino di Grace Chianti Classico 2010
Rosenblum Cellars Snows Lake Vineyard Zinfandel 2006
BRIX Chocolate with Bordeaux and Pinot Noir Gift Set
List.Description:
Chocolate and wine are an amazing duo, they truly bring out the best in each other. This gift set is the perfect tasting collection to indulge a wine and chocolate lover. Offering four chocolate bricks, each with a different cocoa content, BRIX chocolates are specifically blended to complement wine. The natural tannins in cocoa prime the palate for the tannins of the wine, allowing other flavors in the wine to shine. We carefully selected two wines to pair with a specific "brick" of chocolate.

Wine Gift Includes:
  • BRIX Chocolate Sampler:
    Includes four 4 ounce chocolate bricks (extra dark 70%, medium dark 60%, smooth dark 54%, and milk 46%.
  • Domaines Baron Rothschild Reserve Speciale Bordeaux Rouge:
    Generous, rich and full-flavored on the palate, this wine has a long finish with hints of pepper and licorice.
  • Belle Glos Meiomi Pinot Noir:
    Three of the California's most sought after coastal growing regions brilliantly meld together in this deeply flavored, stylish and truly balanced Pinot Noir.

Wine gift sets & baskets may be packaged with the bottles separately boxed for their protection during shipment. Pursuant to state laws in New York, gifts that contain both food and wine will be sent in two separate packages.

List.Name: Perfect Pair Wine Gift Set
List.Description:
Chardonnay and Cabernet Sauvignon from Greystone Cellars, made by the Culinary Institute of America, are paired perfectly with a beautiful wood crate full of sweet and savory bites.

Wine Gift Includes:

  • Greystone Cellars Chardonnay:
    Along with aromas of golden apple and succulent melon, this Chardonnay has apple and mineral flavors and a round, juicy texture.

  • Greystone Cellars Cabernet Sauvignon:
    Garnet in color, with aromas of tart cherries, caramel and coffee. Flavors are spicy with black pepper and cinnamon tightly woven through the Bing cherry core.

  • Sonoma Jacks Original Cheese 4 oz
  • Beef Summer Sausage 5oz
  • Three Pepper Water Crackers 2 oz
  • Spanish Manzanilla Olives 2 oz
  • Nunes Farms Spicy Cocktail Almonds 5 oz
  • Beth's Chocolate Chip Cookies 2 oz
  • Napa Mustard 1.75 oz

    • Wood crate included.

    <
